name: Raidraptor - Stranger Falcon
effectText:
2 Level 5 monsters
If this card has an Xyz Monster as material, it gains this effect.
‚óèOnce per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal its original ATK.
If this card in your possession is destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your GY: You can target 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster in your GY, except "Raidraptor - Stranger Falcon"; Special Summon it, and if you do, attach this card to it as material.
